com.splunk.cloudfwd.impl.http

Class HttpSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.splunk.cloudfwd.impl.http.HttpSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Endpoints, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class HttpSender
extends Object
implements Endpoints
    This class performs the actually HTTP send to HEC event collector.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpSender

        public HttpSender(String url,
                  String token,
                  boolean disableCertificateValidation,
                  String cert,
                  String host)
        Initialize HttpEventCollectorSender
        Parameters:
        url - http event collector input server.
        token - application token
        disableCertificateValidation - disables Certificate Validation
        cert - SSL Certificate Authority Public key to verify TLS with Self-Signed SSL Certificate chain
        host - Hostname to use in HTTP requests. It is needed when we use IP addresses in url by RFC
